PathOfBuilding.Notes:
MOONDANCERS
https://www.reddit.com/r/pathofexile/comments/8ay5gn/request_raise_spectre_guide_what_spectres_do_you/
My recommendations:
None until you get to Solaris Temple lvl 1. Probably do SRS or Skelingtons.
In Act 3, Solaris Temple, grab Flame Guardians - the big fire ribbon - as an add-on to your previous DPS stuff.
In Act 5, you can trade up to Kitava Herald's if you want; they are the first "primary" DPS specter option, but not necessarily that amazing. I keep using them as an adjunct to a primary DPS skill. Scale them with physical melee.
In act 6, you can trade up to Tukohama's Vanguards - SR totem mobs - either exclusively, or as a DPS increasing bonus to your Flame Guardians if you are still using them. Not really a bonus if using Heralds.
In act 8, trade up to Solar Guard specters in the Solaris Temple, unless you really fell in love with Kitava Heralds. These are fire/spell specters, and love them some [LG]MP supports. TVs are still a damage boost for bosses, but I suggest not all /that/ valuable, since SGs can clear everything super-fast on their own.
SGs are also when you can ditch that other DPS source, if you want. If you loved Heralds that much, you are also in a good position to ditch other DPS in favor of them alone at this time.
In act 10, you can pick up Wicker Men, which combine with TVs to do great clear, and boss killing. The WM specters have a death aura around them, RF style, that doesn't stack, so ten are the same single target DPS as one. They clear wonderfully though. Normally 2 x Wicker Men, the rest TVs, is a great combo.
You can also stick with Solar Guards, or Heralds, both of which are fully viable. When well supported (5-6 links) they clear very well, and both of those are fully capable of both boss and clear. The TV/WM combo is great, but kinda wants more specters than the first two options, IMO.
I'd strongly suggest either SRS or Skeletons as a DPS adjust, BTW, because as soon as you get an Abyss minion jewel you can scour/alt it into 20 percent increased damage if you cast a minion skill recently.
Skeletons are the new hotness, cast to reposition / proc the bonus. SRS is SRS, same as it ever was, and just as kick-ass.
